A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The curse of the sequel. Very disappointing second effort with an overkill of comic relief. Highlight: the complicated relationship between Rey and Kylo Ren- Adam Driver is by far the best actor in the movie Lowpoint: The lame attempts at humor (especially when Luke brushes an attack off his shoulder like he’s Jay-z)\, the let down if no real interaction between Rey and Fin (Especially when he wakes up and his first word is “Rey”) and the plot makes more jumps then the Millennium Falcon. If you are a fan\, you will see this movie regardless of the reviews but be prepared for a millennial version of Star Wars and say a little prayer that this series didn’t go the way of Transformers.
